revisions.rev:
This list is for films where at least one [[motorcycle|biker]] appears as a significant plot element. A bike in a film does not qualify for this list.
==Before 1950== * ''Mabel At The Wheel'' (1914), early [[Charlie Chaplin]] film * ''[[Sherlock, Jr.]]'' (1924), [[Buster Keaton]] film with world famous motorcycle scene * ''[[No Limit (1935 film)|No Limit]]'' (1935), starring [[George Formby, Jr.]]

{{multicol}}
* ''[[The Pace that Thrills]]'' (1952) * ''[[The Wild One]]'' (1953) * ''[[The Black Rider (film)|The Black Rider]]'' (1954) * ''[[Teenage Devil Dolls]]'' (1955) * ''Motorcycle Gang'' (1957) * ''The Hot Angel'' (1958) * ''[[Scorpio Rising (film)|Scorpio Rising]]'' (1964) * ''[[The Great Escape (film)|The Great Escape]]'' (1963) * ''[[The Leather Boys]]'' (1964) * ''[[Motorpsycho (film)|Motorpsycho]]'' (also known as ''Motor Psycho'') (1965) * ''[[Girls From Thunder Strip]]'' (1966) * ''[[Outlaw Motorcycles]]'' (1966) * ''[[The Wild Angels]]'' (1966) * ''[[The Born Losers]]'' (1967, released 1968) * ''[[Devil's Angels]]'' (1967) * ''[[Hells Angels on Wheels]]'' (1967) * ''[[The Glory Stompers]]'' (1967) * ''[[The Hellcats]]'' (also known as ''Biker Babes'') (1967) * ''[[Angels from Hell]]'' (1968) * ''Hell's Chosen Few'' (1968) * ''[[Il Profeta]]'' (1968) * ''[[The Mini-Skirt Mob]]'' (1968) * ''Savages from Hell'' (1968) * ''[[The Savage Seven]]'' (1968) * ''[[She-Devils on Wheels]]'' (1968) * ''[[Easy Rider]]'' (1969) * ''[[Five the Hard Way]]'' (also known as ''[[The Sidehackers]]'') (1969) * ''[[Free Grass]]'' (also known as ''[[Scream Free!]]'') (1969) * ''[[Hell's Angels '69]]'' (1969) * ''[[Naked Angels]]'' (1969) * ''[[Run, Angel, Run]]'' (1969) * ''[[Satan's Sadists]]'' (also known as Nightmare Bloodbath) (1969) * ''[[Sisters in Leather]]'' (1969) * ''[[Then Came Bronson]]'' (1969) * ''[[Wild Wheels]]'' (1969)

* ''[[Any Which Way You Can]]'' (1980) * ''[[Kuruizaki sanda rodo]]'' (1980) * ''[[Spetters]]'' (1980) * ''[[Take It to the Limit (film)|Take It to the Limit]]'' (1980) * ''[[Knightriders]]'' (1981) * ''[[The Road Warrior|Mad Max 2]]'' (also known a ''The Road Warrior'') (1981) * ''[[Silver Dream Racer]]'' (1981) * ''[[Return of the Rebels]]'' (1981) * ''[[The Aftermath (film)|The Aftermath]]'' (1982) * ''[[Bakuretsu toshi]]'' (1982) * ''[[Grease 2]]'' (1982) * ''[[The Loveless]]'' (1982) * ''[[Megaforce]]'' (1982) * ''[[Timerider: The Adventure of Lyle Swann]]'' (1982) * ''[[1990: The Bronx Warriors]]'' (''1990:I Guerrieri Del Bronx'') (1982) * ''[[Escape from the Bronx]]'' (also known as ''Bronx Warriors 2 '' or ''Fuga Dal Bronx'') (1983) * ''[[Hells Angels Forever]]'' (1983), a documentary * ''2019: After the Fall of New York'' (1983) * ''[[Hell Riders]]'' (1984) * ''[[Streets of Fire]]'' (1984) * ''[[City Limits (1985 film)|City Limits]]'' (1985) * ''[[The Dirt Bike Kid]]'' (1985) * ''[[Mask (film)|Mask]]'' (1985) * ''[[Savage Dawn]]'' (1985) * ''[[Eat The Peach]]'' (1986) * ''[[The Majorettes]]'' (1986) * ''[[Vamp (film)|Vamp]]'' (1986) * ''[[Eye of the Tiger (film)|Eye of the Tiger]]'' (1986) * ''[[Shame]]'' (1987) * ''Winners Take All'' (1987) * ''[[The Dark Side Of The Sun]]'' (1988) * ''[[The Mouse and the Motorcycle]]'' (1988) * ''[[Nightmare Beach]]'' (1988) * ''[[Runaway Ralph]]'' (1988) * ''[[Black Rain (American film)|Black Rain]]'' (1989) * ''[[Easy Wheels]]'' (1989) * ''[[Chopper Chicks in Zombietown]]'' (1989)
==1990s==
* ''[[Masters of Menace]]'' (1990) * ''[[The Final Alliance]]'' (1990) * ''[[Don't Tell Her It's Me]]'' (1990) * ''[[I Bought a Vampire Motorcycle]]'' (1990) * ''[[Born to Ride]]'' (1991) * ''[[Blood Ties (film)|Blood Ties]]'' (1991) * ''[[Stone Cold (film)|Stone Cold]]'' (1991) * ''[[Harley Davidson and the Marlboro Man]]'' (1991) * ''The Last Riders'' (1991) * ''[[Roadside Prophets]]'' (1992) * ''[[Beyond the Law (1992 film)|Beyond the Law]]'' (1992) * ''[[Chrome Soldiers]]'' (1992) * ''[[Running Cool]]'' (1993) * ''[[Jailbreakers]]'' (1994) * ''Iron Horsemen'' (also known as ''Bad Trip'') (1994), a comedy * ''Motorcycle Gang'' (1994) * ''[[Lazy Man's Zen]]'' (1994) * ''[[The Stranger (1995 film)|The Stranger]]'' (1995) * ''[[Zombie Cult Massacre]]'' (1998) * ''[[Biker Dreams]]'' (1998) * ''[[Inferno (1999 film)|Inferno]]'' (also known as ''Desert Heat'' and ''Coyote Moon'') (1999) * ''Me & Will'' (1999)
==2000s-present==
* ''[[One_Week_(2008_film)|One Week]]'' (2008) * ''[[Hellblock 13]]'' (2000) * ''[[Hochelaga (film)|Hochelaga]]'' (2000) * ''[[Biker Zombies]]'' (2001) * ''[[Lone Hero]]'' (2002) * ''[[Biker Boyz]]'' (2003) * ''[[One Mans Island (Isle of Man)]]'' (2003) * ''[[Danny Deckchair]]'' (2003), a comedy * ''[[Angel in Chains]]'' (2004) * ''[[Torque (film)|Torque]]'' (2004) * ''[[Dhoom]]'' (2004) * ''[[Motorcycle Diaries]]'' (2004) * ''[[Choppertown: the Sinners]]'' (2005), a feature documentary * ''[[The Rain Makers]]'' (2005) * ''[[The World's Fastest Indian]]'' (2005) * ''[[Greed (2006 film)|Greed]]'' (2006) * ''[[Iceland Adventure]]'' (2006) * ''[[Riding Solo to the Top of the World]]'' (2006) * ''[[Missionary Man (film)|Missionary Man]]'' (2007) * ''[[Choppertown: From The Vault]]'' (2007), a documentary * ''[[Ghost Rider (film)|Ghost Rider]]'' (2007) * ''[[Wild Hogs]]'' (2007), a comedy * ''[[Silk Road Adventure]]'' (2007) * ''[[Vampire Biker Babes]]'' (2007) * ''[[Freebird (film)|Freebird]]'' (2008), a comedy * ''[[Brittown]]'' (2008), a feature documentary * ''[[Hell Ride]]'' (2008) * ''[[Outlaw Bikers]]'' (2008) * ''[[Redline America]]'' (2008) * ''Biker Mania'' (2009), a documentary * ''[[One Crazy Ride]]'' (2009) * ''[[The Harbortown Bobber]]'' (2009), a feature documentary * ''[[TT (Isle of Man)]]'' (2010) * ''[[The Kids Are All Right]]'' (2010), a comedy / drama
[[Harvey Lembeck]] also did a parody of [[Marlon Brando]] from ''The Wild One'' as the bumbling leader of the inept Rat Pack motorcycle gang in six [[Beach Party films]]: ''[[Beach Party]]'' (1963), ''[[Bikini Beach]]'' and ''[[Pajama Party (film)|Pajama Party]]'' (both 1964), ''[[Beach Blanket Bingo]]'' and ''[[How to Stuff a Wild Bikini]]'' (both 1965), and ''[[The Ghost in the Invisible Bikini]]'' (1966).
